listings.name: Original Dogma (Née Speedball)
listings.description: A strong ale, brewed with guarana, Californian poppy, kola nut and Scottish heather honey. A conspiracy of trans-continental ingredients infused with some devastatingly BrewDog imaginative thinking.

listings.name: Truffle and Chocolate Stout
listings.description: Truffle & Chocolate Stout. Deep, earthy roast notes make this a gastronome's dream

listings.name: Rabiator
listings.description: Imperial Wheat beer / Weizenbock brewed by a homesick German in leather trousers. Think banana bread, bubble gum and David Hasselhoff.
